title: Gather Requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the SyntheticOrganFactory system, including functional and non-functional requirements, regulatory compliance, user stories, and stakeholder input.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop 3D Bioprinting Module
description: Develop the module for 3D bioprinting synthetic organs, including tissue engineering, biomaterials, and printing algorithms.

title: Develop Organ Design Module
description: Develop the module for designing synthetic organs, including 3D modeling, simulations, and optimization algorithms.

title: Implement Data Management
description: Implement the data management system, including databases, data models, and data pipelines.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop testing and quality assurance strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and regulatory compliance tests.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, including data encryption, access control, and auditing.

title: Set up DevOps and Deployment
description: Set up DevOps processes and infrastructure for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment.

title: Create Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and regulatory compliance documentation.
